The Walt Disney Birthplace is a two - story , wood cottage that was designed and built by Walt & Roy 's parents , Flora and Elias Disney in 1893 , in the Hermosa neighborhood of Chicago .
They were joined by Walt , who was also born in the home , on December 5 , 1901 and in 1903 their sister Ruth came along .
The time all seven Disneys ' lived in this house was the longest period they would all spend under the same roof .
